nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars Official Movie Storybook
Star Wars: The Clone Wars Official Movie Storybook is a children's storybook that tie into Star Wars: The Clone Wars. It was published in the UK on August 7, 2008.

Discover the extraordinary stories behind the Clone Wars movie. Find out more about the exciting new chapter in George Lucas' legendary saga - The Clone Wars in this official book of the movie. Herein lies an epic adventure jam packed with heroic battles, astonishing new revelations, brand new heroes and story twists. It is an exciting addition to any Star Wars fans collection.
